mapper.select: SELECT NICKNAME,ID,URL,VOLUNTEER_ID FROM VOLUNTEER_VIEW WHERE B_ID = #{b_id} ORDER BY BDATE

SELECT VOLUNTEER_ID , (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE VOLUNTEER_ID = Q.VOLUNTEER_ID) AS CLUBMEM_ID , FN_VOLUNTEER_ID(VOLUNTEER_ID) AS ID , FN_VOLUNTEER_MID(VOLUNTEER_ID) AS MID , FN_VOLUNTEER_NICKNAME(VOLUNTEER_ID) AS NICKNAME , FN_VOLUNTEER_URL(VOLUNTEER_ID) AS URL FROM ( SELECT T.*, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT DESC,BDATE) AS RANK FROM ( SELECT E.VOLUNTEER_ID,COUNT(*) AS COUNT ,(SELECT BDATE FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE VOLUNTEER_ID = E.VOLUNTEER_ID) AS BDATE FROM EXE_VOTE E LEFT JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON E.VOLUNTEER_ID = V.VOLUNTEER_ID WHERE MOTION_ID = #{motion_id} GROUP BY E.VOLUNTEER_ID )T )Q WHERE RANK = 1
SELECT VOLUNTEER_ID,B_ID,CLUBMEM_ID,NICKNAME,ID,URL,CID,MID FROM VOLUNTEER_VIEW WHERE BDATE = (SELECT MIN(BDATE) FROM VOLUNTEER_VIEW WHERE B_ID = #{b_id}) AND B_ID = #{b_id}
